p: Both the lack of effective drugs for the treatment of type 2 diabetes and the increasing prevalence of the disease have created an urgent need to improve drug therapies. Some studies have shown that natural, plant-derived products have safe characteristics, with minimal side effects, unlike many widely used synthetic drugs [ 37]. The use of natural drugs for the treatment of diabetes and its associated complications is expanding worldwide, and many plant-based products exhibit antidiabetic effects [ 37, 49].
